name: Arachnophobia (itch) (tjadenad)
description:
Run from the spiders and don't touch the poison pools. The speed of the spiders increases every 10 seconds, and a new spider spawns every 3 seconds. See if you can beat your high score!

The ground texture is from Genetica: http://spiralgraphics.biz/packs/

The sounds are all from http://www.freesound.org

Material for the ThirdPersonController: http://mypandur.com/Tuts/Unity/30min/EthanAlbedoSpecular.png
